dcterms:title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World: The Game
dcterms:alternative: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World: The Game - Complete Edition
dcterms:creator: Ubisoft Montreal; Ubisoft Chengdu
dcterms:subject: Beat 'em up; Pixel Art; Retrogaming
dcterms:description: Side-scrolling beat 'em up game based on the Scott Pilgrim graphic novels, featuring pixel art by Paul Robertson and music by Anamanaguchi. Players control Scott, Ramona, and others to defeat the League of Evil Exes.
